label: 律
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: One of two basic seven-tone scales in traditional Japanese music; the other was ryo. The ritsu modes were called ichikotsu, sōjō, and taishiki; the ryo modes, hyōjō, ōshiki, and banshiki. [壱越, 双調, 太食, 呂, 平調, 黄鐘, 盤渉]
